Package main.Purchaseables

Class Item

java.lang.Object
main.Purchaseables.Item
All Implemented Interfaces:
Purchasable
Direct Known Subclasses:
HealInjury, HealthRestore, InteractiveItem
public abstract class Item extends Object implements Purchasable
The main Item superclass; handles Item costs and generation, including a static method to generate new Items of a random type. Items may be bought by the player from the shop, stored in the player's inventory array, and used on Athlete's in the player's team.

      Constructor. Generates a placeholder name and purchase/resale costs for a new Item.

      public void setName(String newName)
      Sets a new name for the Item.
      Parameters:
      newName - String containing the Item's intended new name.

    • getBuyCost

      public int getBuyCost()
      Get the Item's purchase cost.
      Returns:
      Int representing the cost to purchase the Item.

    • getSellCost

      public int getSellCost()
      Get the Item's resale cost.
      Returns:
      Int representing the funds obtained if the player resells the item.

    • buy

      public void buy(PlayerTeam player)
      Unused skeleton method to process the player's purchase of an Item. Withdraws funds from the player and adds the Item to their inventory array. Currently handled instead from within Shop class.
      Specified by:
      buy in interface Purchasable
      Parameters:
      player - PlayerTeam containing the inventory to add the Item to.

    • sell

      public void sell(PlayerTeam player)
      Processes resale of Items. Adds the Item's sellCost to the player's money and removes it from their inventory.
      Parameters:
      player - PlayerTeam to add the funds to and remove the Item from.

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Generates a formatted description of the Item featuring its name and effect. For display in the store and club inventory menus.
      Returns:
      String displaying the Item's name and effect in a readable format.

    • getEffect

      public abstract String getEffect()
      Abstract method implemented by Item subclasses. Retrieves a description determined by the Item's type.
      Returns:
      String containing a description of the Item and its effects.

    • getPurchaseDetails

      public String getPurchaseDetails()
      Prints the results of getDescription() followed by the Item's purchase and resale costs in a similar format.
      Specified by:
      getPurchaseDetails in interface Purchasable
      Returns:
      String containing Item description, name, and costs.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides default toString() to return the Item's name as definied by its subclass.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String containing the Item's name.

    • use

      public abstract String use(Athlete useOn, PlayerTeam player)
      Abstract method implemented by Item subclasses. Activates the Item's effect as determined by its type.
      Parameters:
      useOn - Athlete the item is to be used on.
      player - PlayerTeam whose inventory contains the Item to be used.
      Returns:
      String confirming the Item's effects after use.

    • genItem

      public static Item genItem(Random rand)
      Static method to generate a new Item of a randomized type out of the four available subclasses. HealthRestore are more common than other types, while HealInjury are the rarest.
      Parameters:
      rand - Random number generation object as defined at game start.
      Returns:
      A new randomly-generated Item; either a HeathRestore, StatBoost, StatReroll, or HealInjury.
